use_cases_desc:
They key application is a travel planning application. 
Core elements are the groupware components for mostly mobile phones, and the larger views in the web browser.
Focus of the actual development is in making it easier for developers to design such applications, minimizing overhead.
evaluation: Survey; Feature commenting or think aloud
contribution_desc: Designed a multi device (thin client) travel application, for use on phones, mobile webbrowsers, PDAs, desktop computers and so on.
crossdevice_def:
Multi-device application.
(but in the sense of usable on multiple devices).
